title: Playing for You
description: He wants to get in her band. She wants to get away from herself.Koty Jackson wanted to be a rock star, not a singer in the boy band ESX. When he finds out that Jett Costa is looking for a new guitarist and vocalist for her band, Perpetual Smile, Koty is determined to get his demo to her label. But his agent thinks he’s crazy, and when he runs into Jett for a late-night television interview, she tells him that she’ll never allow him in her band.Jett Costa wasn’t looking for love. After losing the love of her life and the man who helped her build Perpetual Smile from the ground up, all she wants to do is get through their tour in one piece. She never thought she would let a boy band singer in her band—and she also didn’t think she would fall in love with him.Playing for You is a 75,000-word standalone rockstar romance.Author's Note: Playing for You was originally serialized as the ESX series, under the titles Amplified, Tempo, Bridge, Pitch, Fugue, and Coda. The entire saga is now available as a standalone novel edition, Playing for You.
author: Elizabeth Barone
